casebody.data:
Benjamin DROST v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 5853. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. April 7, 1958. No appearance for appellant. James C. Perrill, Asst. U. S. Atty., Denver, Colo., for appellee.

Before BRATTON, Chief Judge, and PICKETT, Circuit Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Docketed and dismissed on motion of appellee for failure of appellant diligently to prosecute the same.
